languages.text: "Пролитая кровь смыла порчу с наших тел, будет верно следом омыть наши души благословениями слуги Неумирающего. Друзианцы, как и Кровавая паутина, предаются аскезе, отвергают богатство и роскошь, отдавая себя служению Ему. Хоть их стезя и разнится с нашей, Первый ткач отзывался о них с уважением".

"The shed blood has washed away the taint from our bodies — it is only right that we now wash our souls with the blessings of the servant of the Undying One. The Drusians, like the Bloodspun Web, are devoted to asceticism, rejecting wealth and luxury and surrendering themselves to His service. Though their thread is different from ours, the First Spinner spoke of them with respect."
languages.original_text: "Пролитая кровь смыла порчу с наших тел, будет верно следом омыть наши души благословениями слуги Неумирающего. Друзианцы, как и Кровавая паутина, предаются аскезе, отвергают богатство и роскошь, отдавая себя служению Ему. Хоть их стезя и разнится с нашей, Первый ткач отзывался о них с уважением".

languages.text: “我们已经通过流血，净化了我们躯体上的污点。如今，我们应该通过不死之神仆人的祝福，涤荡我们的灵魂。德鲁苏斯教派正如织血罗网一样，同样致力于禁欲主义，摒弃财富与奢侈的生活，勤勤恳恳地侍奉不死之神。尽管他们的丝线与我们有所不同，但首席织网者提到他们时，语气中总会带着尊敬之意。”
languages.original_text: "The shed blood has washed away the taint from our bodies — it is only right that we now wash our souls with the blessings of the servant of the Undying One. The Drusians, like the Bloodspun Web, are devoted to asceticism, rejecting wealth and luxury and surrendering themselves to His service. Though their thread is different from ours, the First Spinner spoke of them with respect."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经通过流血，净化了我们躯体上的污点。如今，我们应该通过不死之神仆人的祝福，涤荡我们的灵魂。德鲁苏斯教派正如织血罗网一样，同样致力于禁欲主义，摒弃财富与奢侈的生活，勤勤恳恳地侍奉不死之神。尽管他们的丝线与我们有所不同，但首席织网者提到他们时，语气中总会带着尊敬之意。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «La sangre derramada ha lavado la mácula de nuestros cuerpos; es de justicia que ahora lavemos también nuestras almas con las bendiciones del Inmortal. Los drusianos, al igual que la Red Sanguinolenta, consagran sus vidas al ascetismo, rechazando la riqueza y los lujos materiales para entregarse en cuerpo y alma a Su servicio. Aunque el hilo de su sino difiere del nuestro, el Primer Tejedor hablaba de ellos con respeto».
languages.original_text: "The shed blood has washed away the taint from our bodies — it is only right that we now wash our souls with the blessings of the servant of the Undying One. The Drusians, like the Bloodspun Web, are devoted to asceticism, rejecting wealth and luxury and surrendering themselves to His service. Though their thread is different from ours, the First Spinner spoke of them with respect."

Aunque el hilo de su sino difiere del nuestro, el Primer Tejedor hablaba de ellos con respeto».

languages.text: 「流された血は、私たちの身体から汚れを洗い流しました。今こそ、不死の者の従者の祝福で魂を洗うときです。ドルシア族はブラッドスパン・ウェブと同様、禁欲主義に傾倒し、富と贅沢を拒み、主の奉仕に身を委ねています。彼らの糸は我々のものとは異なりますが、『第一の紡ぎ手』は彼らに対して尊敬の念をもっていました」
languages.original_text: "The shed blood has washed away the taint from our bodies — it is only right that we now wash our souls with the blessings of the servant of the Undying One. The Drusians, like the Bloodspun Web, are devoted to asceticism, rejecting wealth and luxury and surrendering themselves to His service. Though their thread is different from ours, the First Spinner spoke of them with respect."

traits.locale_text: 「流された血は、私たちの身体から汚れを洗い流しました。今こそ、不死の者の従者の祝福で魂を洗うときです。ドルシア族はブラッドスパン・ウェブと同様、禁欲主義に傾倒し、富と贅沢を拒み、主の奉仕に身を委ねています。彼らの糸は我々のものとは異なりますが、『第一の紡ぎ手』は彼らに対して尊敬の念をもっていました」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Das vergossene Blut hat den Makel von unseren Leibern gewaschen ... es ist nur rechtens, dass wir nun unsere Seelen mit dem Segen eines Dieners des Todlosen reinwaschen. Die Drusianer sind wie das Blutgesponnene Netz Asketen, die Wohlstand und Luxus ablehnen und ihr Leben in Seinen Dienst stellen. Obschon sich ihr Faden von unserem unterscheidet, hatte der Erste Spinner Respekt vor ihnen."
languages.original_text: "The shed blood has washed away the taint from our bodies — it is only right that we now wash our souls with the blessings of the servant of the Undying One. The Drusians, like the Bloodspun Web, are devoted to asceticism, rejecting wealth and luxury and surrendering themselves to His service. Though their thread is different from ours, the First Spinner spoke of them with respect."

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Le sang versé a lavé la souillure qui gangrenait nos corps, et il est tout naturel que nous purifiions à présent nos âmes grâce aux bénédictions du serviteur de l'Immortel. Tout comme la Toile de Sang, les Drusiens mènent une vie d'ascètes, rejetant les biens et plaisirs matériels pour mieux se dévouer corps et âme à Son service. Si leur fil est différent du nôtre, le premier tisseur leur voue un profond respect. »
languages.original_text: "The shed blood has washed away the taint from our bodies — it is only right that we now wash our souls with the blessings of the servant of the Undying One. The Drusians, like the Bloodspun Web, are devoted to asceticism, rejecting wealth and luxury and surrendering themselves to His service. Though their thread is different from ours, the First Spinner spoke of them with respect."
